original_text: and Azariah the chief priest, from the family of Zadok, answered, “Since the people began to bring their contributions to the temple of the Lord, we have had enough to eat and plenty to spare, because the Lord has blessed his people, and this great amount is left over.”
korean_text: 사독의 족속 대제사장 아사랴가 그에게 대답하여 이르되 백성이 예물을 여호와의 전에 드리기 시작함으로부터 우리가 만족하게 먹었으나 남은 것이 많으니 이는 여호와께서 그의 백성에게 복을 주셨음이라 그 남은 것이 이렇게 많이 쌓였나이다

sentences.original_text: Since the people began to bring their contributions
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 그들의 헌물을 가져오기 시작한 이후

sentences.original_text: to the temple of the Lord
we have had enough to eat
because the Lord has blessed his people
and this great amount is left over
